Methods  

actionPhrase ( )

english.t[5766]

builds the action phrase of the command, e.g. ‘jump’, ‘take the red ball’, ‘put the blue ball in the basket’. This can be used to help construct the player char’s command to the actor in the topic response, e.g. “<q>\<<actionPhrase>>!</q> you cry. “

getName (obj)

english.t[5822]

Get the appropriate name for an object to use the action phrase of a CommandTopic. Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
